title: Cycloalkane-rich sustainable aviation fuel production via hydrotreating lignocellulosic biomass-derived catalytic fast pyrolysis oils
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01151A, Paper

Xiaolin Chen, Kellene A. Orton, Calvin Mukarakate, Katherine Gaston, Gina M. Fioroni, Robert L. McCormick, Michael B. Griffin, Kristiina Iisa
CFP oils produced in two different CFP facilities were converted to cycloalkane-rich sustainable aviation fuel via a non-isothermal hydrotreating process.
